Key.English: You are considered team-killer and therefore not allowed in BLUFOR or OPFOR teams. You will shortly be kicked back to the lobby where you can only join Independent and killing anyone is allowed.
You have played as %1 for too long and cannot switch to the other team. You can still play as Independent. (or if online, ask an admin to unlock you)
Please enter driver seat before attempting to refuel the vehicle.

* You are in %3 team.
* Attacking or stealing from other %4 players is FORBIDDEN
* NO VOICE IN GLOBAL
* You can find the Server Rules in the map menu.
* Server restarts are done at the admin's discretion.
* You will be locked to your team after 3 minutes.

* You are in %3 team.
* You are FREE TO ATTACK ANYONE
* NO VOICE IN GLOBAL
* You can find the Server Rules in the map menu.
* Server restarts are done at the admin's discretion.

Report bugs and suggestions at http://forums.a3wasteland.com/
Server restarts are done at the admin's discretion.
For more info please see the map

[Hotfix 1]

Team killing is against the rules!
If this was a mistake then you must explain yourself and say sorry, otherwise they will mark you as team-killer and you will get kicked.

1. Keep bad language to a minimum. If you have a problem with another player, take it to direct.
2. NO VOIP IN GLOBAL. Use the channels or Teamspeak!.
3. Team killing when you are in BLUFOR or OPFOR is forbidden and punishable. Play as Independent if you want to be free for all.
4. Revealing information about your (ex)team to other teams is lame and not appreciated
5. Do not exploit R3F or any other add-ons or you will be banned.
6. Using or spamming with loud\long custom sound commands will cause punishment up to permanent ban
OMG! Enemy player just entered the area
Greece is a hot place! Drink plenty!
An improvised roof, 4 sticks and a blanket!
The Greek wastelands may get you hungry!
With this kit, you won't need an engineer!
With this kit, you won't need a medic!
Empty fuel can. You can refill it!
Choose your spawn location. Disclaimer: This product does not guarantee safe delivery of goods.
Go forth and steal fuel from vehicles!
Allows you to sprint continuously for 5 minutes.
A safe to store your team's money.

You got team-killed by %2 player %1.

If this was an accident then forgive them, otherwise they should explain their actions.

If the player does not explain why then select Punish or Announce.
You are already performing another action!
You already have an active spawn beacon!
You cannot enter a vehicle while placing a spawn beacon!
You cannot take more spawn beacons!

Key.French: Heliporter l'objet
Objet "%1" attaché.

Key.English: The object "%1" is already transported by a vehicle.
Key.French: L'objet "%1" est déjà transporté un véhicule.

Key.English: The object "%1" is being moved by a player.
Key.French: L'objet "%1" est en train d'être déplacé par un joueur.

Key.English: There is a player in the object "%1".
Key.French: Un joueur se trouve dans l'objet "%1".

Key.English: Can't lift the object "%1" because it's towing another object.
Key.French: Impossible d'héliporter l'objet "%1" car il est en train de remorquer un autre objet.
Larguer l'objet
Objet "%1" largué.
Prendre cet objet
Relacher l'objet

Key.English: You can't get in a vehicle while you're carrying this object !
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez pas monter dans un véhicule tant que vous portez cet objet !

Key.English: Moving too fast! (Press C to slow down)
Key.French: Vous marchez trop vite ! (Touche majuscule pour ralentir)
Charger dans...

Key.English: Now select the vehicle in which to load the object "%1"...
Key.French: Sélectionnez maintenant le véhicule dans lequel charger l'objet "%1"...

Key.English: ... load the selected object in this vehicle
Key.French: ... charger l'objet sélectionné dans ce véhicule
Chargement en cours...

Key.English: The object "%1" has been loaded in the vehicle.
Key.French: L'objet "%1" a été chargé dans le véhicule.

Key.English: The object "%1" is too far from the vehicle to be loaded.
Key.French: L'objet "%1" est trop loin du véhicule pour être chargé.

Key.English: There is not enough space in this vehicle. Space left: %1, Required: %2
Key.French: Il n'y pas assez de place pour cet objet dans ce véhicule.
L'objet "%1" est en cours de transport.
Charger dans le véhicule
Chargement en cours...

Key.English: The object has been loaded in the vehicle "%1.
Key.French: L'objet a été chargé dans le véhicule "%1".

Key.English: There is not enough space in this vehicle.
Key.French: Il n'y pas assez de place pour cet objet dans ce véhicule.
Remorquer à...

Key.English: Now select the vehicle in which to load the object "%1"...
Key.French: Sélectionnez maintenant le véhicule dans lequel charger l'objet "%1"...

Key.English: ... tow the selected object to this vehicle
Key.French: ... remorquer l'objet sélectionné à ce véhicule

Key.English: The object "%1" is too far from the vehicle to be towed.
Key.French: L'objet "%1" est trop loin du véhicule pour être remorqué.
L'objet "%1" est en cours de transport.
Remorquer l'objet
Décrocher l'objet
Objet décroché.

Key.English: Only the pilot can detach this object.
Key.French: Seul le pilote peut décrocher cet objet.
Voir le contenu du véhicule
Déchargement en cours...

Key.English: The object has been unloaded from the vehicle.
Key.French: L'objet a été déchargé du véhicule.

Key.English: The object has already been unloaded.
Key.French: L'objet a déjà été déchargé.
Ce véhicule est en cours de transport.
L'opération en cours n'est pas finie.
